content:
Bendera yetu? Our 
 flag 
 
 Ursula Nafula 
 English and Kiswahili 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Maziwa ni meupe. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Milk is white. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 Tunasugua meno 
 
 
 yetu ili yawe 
 
 meupe zaidi. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We brush our 
 
 teth to kep 
 
 them white. 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 Mboga ambazo 
 
 zimo katika 
 
 
 bustani yetu 
 
 ni za kijani 
 
 kibichi. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The vegetables 
 
 in our garden 
 
 are gren. 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 Maembe yaliyomo 
 
 
 kwenye mwembe wa 
 
 jirani ni ya kijani 
 
 kibichi. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The mangoes on 
 
 our neighbourâ€™s tre 
 
 are also gren. 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Damu yangu ni 
 
 nyekundu. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My blod is red. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 Damu yangu ni 
 
 
 nyekundu kama 
 
 nyanya. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My blod is red 
 
 like a tomato. 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 Mama anakoka moto 
 
 
 kutumia maka 
 
 meusi. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mother lights 
 
 the stove with 
 
 black charcoal. 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 Nyeupe, kijani kibichi, 
 
 
 nyekundu na nyeusi ni 
 
 rangi za bendera yetu. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 White, gren, 
 
 red and black 
 
 are the colours 
 
 of our flag. 
 
 
 
 8
